name: In the Matter of Patricia BALLNER.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties: In the Matter of Patricia BALLNER.
casebody.head_matter:
In the Matter of Patricia BALLNER.
No. D-2913.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 9, 2017.
Patricia Ballner, of New York, New York, having requested to resign as a member of the Bar of this Court, it is ordered that her name be stricken from the roll of attorneys admitted to the practice of law before this Court. The Rule to Show Cause, issued on July 18, 2016, is discharged.
